text: For those that have been using React/Vue in HubSpot, have you done any audits of the effects on SEO? We are considering using React components for modules as a long term solution, so trying to cover all bases. The fact that there is no content in a module before the javascript loads concerns me, but from what I’ve read it sounds like search engines account for that these days.

Search engines do account for it, do note I’ve read on one of Google’s pages discussing it - they index/refresh the index for pages that are javascript heavy slower. That doesn’t mean lower SEO but may influence how fast content and content changes are indexed.

Google updates how they crawl and index all the time, see their official documentation for the most accurate information
Excellent, thanks for the input Jon!
